name: mcafee-mvision-insights
label: McAfee Mvision Insights
description: MVISION Insights APIs provide intelligence about Campaigns, associated IOCs and Events. They also provide classification information on file-hashes. This connector facilitates the automated operations related to Campaigns, Events, or IOCs.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: The URL of the McAfee Mvision Insights server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Client ID
fields.description: The Client ID used to access the McAfee Mvision Insights server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: client_id

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.description: The Client Secret used to access the McAfee Mvision Insights server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: client_secret

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: The API Key used to access the McAfee Mvision Insights endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: api_key

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get All IOC List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all IOCs or specific IOCs from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say incidents starting from the 10th IOC. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say incidents starting from the 10th IOC. By default, this is set as 0.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Campaign ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign whose associated IOCs you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insight.

parameters.title: IOC Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of IOC you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insight.

parameters.title: Fields
parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select or specify the fields that you want to be included in the response. This limits the contents of the response to fields that you have specified. You can select or specify fields such as Type, Value, Coverage, etc
parameters.tooltip: Select or specify the fields that you want to be included in the response. This limits the contents of the response to fields that you have specified. You can select or specify fields such as Type, Value, Coverage, etc

operations.title: Get IOC Details
operations.description: Retrieves information about a specific IOC from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the IOC ID you have specified.

parameters.title: IOC ID
parameters.description: The ID of the IOC whose details you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: id

parameters.title: Fields
parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select or specify the fields that you want to be included in the response. This limits the contents of the response to fields that you have specified. You can select or specify fields such as Type, Value, Coverage, etc
parameters.tooltip: Select or specify the fields that you want to be included in the response. This limits the contents of the response to fields that you have specified. You can select or specify fields such as Type, Value, Coverage, etc

operations.title: Get IOC Campaigns
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all campaigns for a specific IOC from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the IOC ID you have specified.

parameters.title: IOC ID
parameters.description: The ID of the IOC whose associated list of campaigns you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: id

operations.title: Get IOC Relationship Campaigns
operations.description: Retrieves all the details for all the IOCs that are associated with a specific campaign from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Campaign ID you have specified.

parameters.title: IOC ID
parameters.description: The ID of the IOC whose associated campaigns list you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: id

operations.title: Get Artefacts
operations.description: Retrieves information about a specific artifact from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the hash type and hash value you have specified.

parameters.title: Hash Type
parameters.description: The hash type of the artifact whose information you want to retrieve from the McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: hashtype
parameters.tooltip: Hash Type should be md5, sha256.

parameters.title: Hash Value
parameters.description: The hash value of the artifact whose information you want to retrieve from the McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: hashvalue

operations.title: Get All Campaigns List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all campaigns or specific campaigns from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say incidents starting from the 10th campaign. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say incidents starting from the 10th campaign. By default, this is set as 0.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Filter By
parameters.name: filter_by
parameters.description: Select the operator, Like or Exact, using which you want to filter the results returned by this operation, based on the name of the campaign.
parameters.tooltip: This filter will be applied on Campaign Name.

parameters.title: Campaign Name
parameters.name: campaign_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the campaign based on which you want to filter the campaigns returned by this operation.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the campaign based on which you want to filter the campaigns returned by this operation.

parameters.title: Sector
parameters.name: sector
parameters.description: Specify the sector based on which you want to filter the campaigns returned by this operation.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sector based on which you want to filter the campaigns returned by this operation.

parameters.title: Include
parameters.description: Select Prevalence from this field to include country and sector-based prevalence in terms of devices impacted per million for each campaign object in the response.
parameters.name: include
parameters.tooltip: Select Prevalence from this field to include country and sector-based prevalence in terms of devices impacted per million for each campaign object in the response.

parameters.title: Fields
parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select or specify the fields that you want to be included in the response. This limits the contents of the response to fields that you have specified. You can select or specify fields such as Name, Threat Level ID, Description, etc
parameters.tooltip: Select or specify the fields that you want to be included in the response. This limits the contents of the response to fields that you have specified. You can select or specify fields such as Name, Threat Level ID, Description, etc

operations.description: Retrieves information about a specific campaign from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Campaign ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Campaign ID
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign whose details you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: id

parameters.title: Include
parameters.description: Select Prevalence from this field to include country and sector-based prevalence in terms of devices impacted per million for each campaign object in the response.
parameters.name: include
parameters.tooltip: Select Prevalence from this field to include country and sector-based prevalence in terms of devices impacted per million for each campaign object in the response.

parameters.title: Fields
parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select or specify the fields that you want to be included in the response. This limits the contents of the response to fields that you have specified. You can select or specify fields such as Name, Threat Level ID, Description, etc

operations.title: Get Campaign IOCs
operations.description: Retrieves IOCs information associated with a specific campaign from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Campaign ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Campaign ID
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign whose associated IOC details you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: id

operations.title: Get Campaign Relationship IOCs
operations.description: Retrieves all the details for all the IOCs that are associated with a specific campaign from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Campaign ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Campaign ID
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign whose associated IOC list you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: id

operations.title: Get Campaign Galaxies
operations.description: Retrieves galaxies information associated with a specific campaign from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Campaign ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Campaign ID
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign whose associated galaxy details you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: id

operations.title: Get Campaign Relationship Galaxies
operations.description: Retrieves all the details for all the galaxies that are associated with a specific campaign from McAfee Mvision Insights based on the Campaign ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Campaign ID
parameters.description: The ID of the IOC whose associated galaxies list you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: id

operations.title: Get All Campaigns Detected
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all detected campaigns or specific detected campaigns from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say incidents starting from the 10th IOC. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say incidents starting from the 10th IOC. By default, this is set as 0.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.name: campaign_name

parameters.title: Sector
parameters.name: sector

operations.title: Get All Events List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all events or specific from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say incidents starting from the 10th Event. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say incidents starting from the 10th Event. By default, this is set as 0.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Artefact Type
parameters.description: The type of artifact whose associated events you want to retrieve from the McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: artefact_type
parameters.tooltip: Artefact Type should be md5.

parameters.title: Artefact Value
parameters.description: The value of artifact whose associated events you want to retrieve from the McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: artefact_value
parameters.tooltip: The value of artifact whose associated events you want to retrieve from the McAfee Mvision Insights.

parameters.title: Agent GUID
parameters.description: The GUID of the agent whose associated events you want to retrieve from the McAfee Mvision Insights.
parameters.name: agent_guid

parameters.title: Campaign ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign whose associated events you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insight.

parameters.title: From Date
parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: The starting DateTime from when you want to retrieve events from McAfee Mvision Insight.
parameters.tooltip: The starting DateTime from when you want to retrieve events from McAfee Mvision Insight.

parameters.title: To Date
parameters.name: to_time
parameters.description: The ending DateTime till when you want to retrieve events from McAfee Mvision Insight.
parameters.tooltip: The ending DateTime till when you want to retrieve events from McAfee Mvision Insight.

parameters.title: Fields
parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select or specify the fields that you want to be included in the response. This limits the contents of the response to fields that you have specified. You can select or specify fields such as Exec UID, Campaign ID, TimeStamp, etc.
parameters.tooltip: Select or specify the fields that you want to be included in the response. This limits the contents of the response to fields that you have specified. You can select or specify fields such as Exec UID, Campaign ID, TimeStamp, etc.

operations.title: Get All Galaxies List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all galaxies or specific galaxies from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say incidents starting from the 10th Galaxy. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say incidents starting from the 10th Galaxy. By default, this is set as 0.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Category
parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Select the category based on which you want to filter galaxies you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insight. You can choose categories such as MITRE Tool, Botnet, Stealer, etc.
parameters.tooltip: Select the category based on which you want to filter galaxies you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insight. You can choose categories such as MITRE Tool, Botnet, Stealer, etc.

parameters.title: Campaign ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign whose associated galaxies list you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insight.

parameters.title: Fields
parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select or specify the fields that you want to be included in the response. This limits the contents of the response to fields that you have specified. You can select or specify fields such as ID, Name, Description, etc.
parameters.tooltip: Select or specify the fields that you want to be included in the response. This limits the contents of the response to fields that you have specified. You can select or specify fields such as ID, Name, Description, etc.

operations.title: Get Insights Events List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all insight events indicating IoC local sighting or specific insight events from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Artefact Type
parameters.name: artefact_type
parameters.tooltip: The type of artifact whose associated insight events you want to retrieve
parameters.description: The type of artifact whose associated insight events you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.

parameters.title: Artefact Value
parameters.name: artefact_value
parameters.tooltip: The value of artifact whose associated insight events you want to retrieve
parameters.description: The value of artifact whose associated insight events you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.

parameters.title: Agent GUID
parameters.name: agent_guid
parameters.description: The GUID of the agent whose associated insight events you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.

parameters.title: Campaign ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign whose associated insight events you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.

parameters.title: From Date
parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: The starting DateTime from when you want to retrieve insight events from McAfee Mvision Insights.

parameters.title: To Date
parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: The ending DateTime till when you want to retrieve insight events from McAfee Mvision Insights.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say insight events starting from the 10th insight event. By default, this is set as 0.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, that this operation should return.

operations.title: Get Related Samples
operations.description: Returns a list of samples related to the specified sample from McAfee Mvision Insight based on the sample MD hash, static feature MD hash, static feature version, and other input parameters you have specified

parameters.title: Sample MD5 Hash
parameters.name: samplemd5
parameters.tooltip: The sample MD5 Hash value whose related samples you want to retrieve
parameters.description: The sample MD5 Hash value whose related samples you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.

parameters.title: Static Feature MD5 Hash
parameters.name: sfvecmd5
parameters.tooltip: The static feature MD5 Hash value whose related samples you want to retrieve
parameters.description: The static feature MD5 Hash value whose related samples you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.

parameters.title: Static Feature Version
parameters.name: version
parameters.tooltip: The version of the static feature whose related samples you want to retrieve
parameters.description: The version of the static feature whose related samples you want to retrieve from McAfee Mvision Insights.

parameters.title: Days Since Last Seen
parameters.name: lastseen
parameters.tooltip: The days since the related samples were last seen in McAfee Mvision Insight, which is considered to limit the lookup (minimum value: 1).
parameters.description: The days since the related samples were last seen in McAfee Mvision Insights, which is considered to limit the lookup (minimum value: 1).

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of results, that this operation should return
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results, that this operation should return.
